creator: Canada. Department of the Secretary of State (author)
description: The Epitome contains Sessional papers 43, 43a-e, the trial of Riel and documents bearing on it; 45a-c, documents on the claims to title to land by Métis; 52a-c, other trials arising out of the Rebellion. No.45c is not the document with this number in the Sessional papers; 45c in the latter is "copies of all depositions in favor of half-breeds." See also Peel 1533 and 1534.
subject: Rebellions and Regimental Histories--Saskatchewan Rebellion
Canada--Parliament
Riel Rebellion, 1885
Riel, Rébellion de, 1885
title: Epitome of parliamentary documents in connection with the North-West Rebellion, 1885
